name: Night Visit
description:
cw: this game contains religious imagery

Thank you for playing!

This is my first game, I really just made it to practice in Bitsy haha!

The soundtrack is a cover of Anima Christi that I made in UTAU, it's up on my youtube here as well as open for download below, feel free to download and use it! However, please credit and make sure to follow the terms of use for Sukone Tei's vb :)
